description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 1/12/2006

Brooke condemns Stephanie for her involvement in covering up Taylor’s affair. She leaves, and Ridge declares he is upset with Stephanie as well. Ridge is upset at Taylor and Stephanie’s hypocrisy towards Brooke, and he wonders if he made the right decision leaving Brooke for Taylor. Stephanie begs him to work things out with Taylor. Brooke confronts Taylor and tells her that she knows about James. She tells Taylor that she will never feel inferior to her or Stephanie ever again.  Felicia drops by to see Nick and Bridget. They show her the room they made for Dominick and she is thrilled. They ask her to record a message for her son, and Nick videotapes it.
